problem: 如图,在四边形ABCD中,AB=CD,M,N,P分别是AD,BC,BD的中点,若∠MPN=140°,则∠PMN的度数是()
answer: 【解答】解:∵在四边形ABCD中,M、N、P分别是AD、BC、BD的中点,∴PN,PM分别是△CDB与△DAB的中位线,∴PM=\frac{1}{2}AB,PN=\frac{1}{2}DC,PM∥AB,PN∥DC,∵AB=CD,∴PM=PN,∴△PMN是等腰三角形,∵∠MPN=140°,∴∠PMN=\frac{180°-140°}{2}=20°．
comment: 本题考查了三角形中位线定理及等腰三角形的判定和性质,解题时要善于根据已知信息,确定应用的知识．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, in the quadrilateral ABCD, AB = CD, M, N, and P are the midpoints of AD, BC, and BD, respectively. If ∠MPN = N_0, then the degree of ∠PMN is ()
